{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ar150_shop.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = 150N Mini Smart Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.gl-inet.com/ar150 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Not Supported --> |gargoylesupport = Supported
|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-AR150 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/02/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/GL.iNet_GL-AR150 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = 3G mobile router, travel router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIWGL-AR-150 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9331;AR9331-AL3A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = (v7.4) |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Elixir;N2DS51216DS-5T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E4:95:6E |oui = E4:95:6E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.49;OpenWrt Barrier Breaker;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = ^GL-iNet-[0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, Gargoyle, OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2023 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2015 |estprice = 27 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAFN274K0164 |asin = B01FJ4S9JK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B015CYI8DY |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Features=== * Powered by [[Atheros]] AR9331 WiSoC (@400MHz CPU) * 16MB Flash * 64MB RAM * 150Mbps high speed * OpenWrt pre-installed * 4x GPIOs for IoT development * External antenna optional support * Optional PoE support * Stable performance * Low power consumption * Small, light, easy to use
==Links of Interest== ===Official Supports=== :[https://store.gl-inet.com/collections/travel-routers/products/gl-ar150-mini-smart-router Official Shop] :[https://forum.gl-inet.com Official Forum]
===Mentions=== *[https://www.allaboutcircuits.com/news/teardown-tuesday-mini-network-router/ ''Teardown Tuesday: Mini Network Router''] By Robin Mitchell
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = GL.iNet-AR150 build 29519 20160425
Please insert instructions here
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gl.inet/gl.inet_gl-ar150 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/gl.inet/gl-ar150 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=294767 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ar71xx-ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = OpenWrt BB 14.07 is factory installed; PoE option; OpenWrt CC 15.05 http://www.gl-inet.com/firmware/ar150/clean/openwrt-clean-gl-ar150-1.0.bin }} Please insert instructions here
